name: Special Tweet Bird card pack (3 cards: Boatbill, Sandpiper, Crane)
description:
{SWEET TWEET CARD DETAILS}
♥ 3 cards; 3 envelopes
♥ Shore birds: Boatbill, Sandpiper, Crane
♥ teal, turquoise and mint green stitching
♥ blank inside
♥ Italian paper milled by C.M. Fabriano Medioevalis
♥ 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" (A2 size)
♥ 3 kraft paper envelopes
♥ packaged in a clear poly bag and sent  in a flat, rigid mailer

{Sweet Tweet Card Inspiration}
Inspired by ephemera and my obsession with stickers, the birds were first hand cut from the 1948 volumes of THE AMERICAN EDUCATOR ENCYCLOPEDIA (published by The United Educators, Inc.; Chicago, 1948) and backed with industrial cellophane adhesive. Neurotic about details, I carefully cut out the name of the bird and adhered this to the bird image then re-cut & trimmed the bird itself. Using an 'older than me' Singer sewing machine, I zig-zag stitched a piece of deckle-edged jet-black fine art paper to the front of the card. Next the little collaged bird is centered and permanently stuck to the card. (I ♥ STICKERS) Using a pointed nib pen and black waterproof Sumi ink, I hand lettered the name of the bird and added my signature calligraphic flourishes. Each card is one-of-a-kind and will probably never be made again (unless of course I happen to come across the same encyclopedia set)!

thank you!

name: Shades of Love Hearts - Vintage Atlas Sticker Seals
description:
{made with love}
♥ (mix of 20) 1.25" vintage atlas scalloped envelope seals
♥ six different colored hearts*
♥ just peel off backing and stick!
♥ backing has been scored for easy removal
♥ permanent and very strong adhesive
♥ each heart is hand drawn with black sumi ink using a metal dip pen
♥ paper ephemera hand punched from a vintage atlas pronunciation glossary
♥ packaged in a cellophane bag with hand lettered packaging

*You will receive 3 to 4 heart stickers in the following shades:
juicy berry
soulful red
ripe peach
vintage merlot
cotton candy pink
valley girl magenta

Check out www.KisforCalligraphy.etsy.com for more eco-friendly envelope seals!

name: The Envelope Please
description:
{the lettering style*}
"Bend it like Bickham", a style which compliments the elegant Bickham script font commonly used to design many a wedding invitations. And more importantly, a style inspired by the work of the eighteenth century master penman himself, George Bickham.
*look for more lettering styles in the drop down options below. Links to the my lettering styles provided below too!

{the turnaround time}
I will need approx. 14 days (starting after I receive the envelopes and guest list and after the samples are approved) to complete an envelope addressing project.

{the initial process}
Once I receive the envelopes, I will work with you to create sample envelopes. We will work together to confirm the color of ink, address layout and your choice of zip-code flourish (my signature mark, not required but highly advised)

{the important people}
Guest lists may be emailed to me in the following formats: word doc, excel, pdf. (Guest lists do not have to be 100% complete; I prefer you email me the addresses you have first and in the mean time you can work on the incomplete addresses and email those to me soon thereafter)

{the EXTREMELY IMPORTANT thing to do when ordering your invitations}
If possible, PLEASE order 20% extra envelopes. This is really really really important! It saves a lot of time and money in the end. I will inevitably make errors and there is always an add on or an address change if not many!

{pricing per envelope}
$2.50 or $2.95* per outer envelope
$3.50 or $3.95* per outer and inner envelope set
(* metallic ink and white ink are the more expensive options)

{additional fees}
All envelope addressing projects will have an additional one-time set up fee of $20. This fee covers all the preparation time which is often overlooked including custom ink mixing, providing samples, pencil lines for centering if working with darker envelopes, erasing the pencil lines, spraying the envelopes with protective spray if required and so much more.

{THIS IS THE DEPOSIT}
By purchasing, you are paying for a non-refundable deposit which will be deducted from your final custom invoice. You are also reserving your spot in my calligraphy schedule which is exciting and fun for both you and me!

{upon purchasing, you will receive}
After you purchase this deposit, I will email you 2 pdf files with important information including where to send your envelopes, tips for formatting and submitting your guest address list, a simple tips and reminder sheet for wedding invitations and more!

Congratulations to the Bride and Groom!

Lettering Styles (choose from the drop down options and add the option you want to your cart)
Bend it like Bickham http://www.flickr.com/photos/kisforcalligraphy/2278377866/
Brickle Paw http://www.flickr.com/photos/kisforcalligraphy/2072645539/
NG characters http://www.flickr.com/photos/kisforcalligraphy/2073435586/
Avalon Par 9 http://www.flickr.com/photos/kisforcalligraphy/2072643131/
CT Fine Hand http://www.flickr.com/photos/kisforcalligraphy/2073436128/
Taracotta http://www.flickr.com/photos/kisforcalligraphy/2073433842/
iamink pentalic http://www.flickr.com/photos/kisforcalligraphy/2072640547/
Revolution No. 9 http://www.flickr.com/photos/kisforcalligraphy/2073433610/

name: Dainty Mushroom Gift Tags
description:
♥ Set of 10 hand stamped gift tags
♥ Image is of a dainty field of mushrooms stamped in a earthy pine cone brown color fade-resistant pigment ink
♥ bottom edges have been rounded for a softer look
♥ Each manila tag measures approx. 2 3/8" x 3 1/2"
♥ strung with cute and lovely pink, mocha and cream yarn to attach to whatever your heart desires!
♥ packaged as a set in a resealable cellophane bag

Check out www.KisforCalligraphy.etsy.com for more paper goodies!
